datoCmsKey.name: Kristin Sgarro

headshot.title: Kristin Sgarro, headshot via Editor, 2:44:39 AM 4/2/2021

datoCmsKey.discipline: Actor, Music Director, Composer, Emcee, Text Coach, et al.
datoCmsKey.bio: Kristin Sgarro (she/they) is a queer actor, musician, and emcee in New York City. Having begun as a musical theater performer, Kristin now works behind the table composing, arranging, and musically directing, as well as onstage in classical and devised theater with queer themes and framework.
